channel.title: DTO
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from DTO, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump’s focus on 10-year yield to cut borrowing costs raises this key problem
Staffer at Musk's DOGE resigns after racist social media posts exposed
item.description: Elon Musk is running DOGE, or the Department of Government Efficiency, for President Donald Trump, in an effort to slash government spending and staff...

item.title: Fed's Powell to testify to Congress next week, his first appearance since July
Judge pauses Trump federal employee buyout offer pending court hearing
item.description: A lawsuit says the Trump administration's offer of a buyout to federal employees is unlawful, noting that Congress has not appropriated money for it.

item.title: Senate confirms Trump budget director pick Vought
item.description: The Republican-led U.S. Senate confirmed President Donald Trump's nominee Russell Vought as budget director on Thursday,

item.title: Russia's Baltic neighbors are breaking away from its power grid — and they're braced for retaliation
item.description: The Baltic states of Lithuania, Latvia, and Estonia are bracing themselves for possible retaliation as they decouple from Russia's power grid this wee...

item.title: Tariffs: How they work, who pays for them and why Trump loves them
item.description: President Donald Trump in his inaugural speech credited President William McKinley for making the United States "very rich" through tariffs.

item.title: 'Canary in the coal mine': More homeowners are late on their mortgage payments
Amazon’s stock drops as earnings outlook underwhelms
Why buyout offers — like Trump’s to federal workers — are a hard sell
